mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, temp.* from (select seq, mainSubject,subject, content, id, to_char(logtimeQ,'yyyy-mm-DD') as logtimeQ, replyStatus, replyContent from productQnaBoard join product using (productCode) order by seq desc) temp) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, temp.* from (select seq, mainSubject, productCode, subject, content, id, to_char(logtimeQ,'yyyy-mm-DD') as logtimeQ, replyStatus, secretStatus, replyContent from productQnaBoard join product using (productCode) where ${key} = #{value} order by seq desc) temp) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
